articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Livesay: Locals say the Middle East is a 'powder keg', head of Hezbollah holds the match
articles.description: Chris Livesay reports on the reaction to the death of Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani in Lebanon, where the local press is describing the situation as a "powder keg."

articles.title: Trump has put America ‘in a very bad place’ policy expert says
articles.description: Donald Trump has threatened to attack Iranian culture sites over Twitter, if Iran retaliates for the killing of Iranian general Qassem Soleimani. Mehdi Hasan, columnist for The Intercept, gives his strong opinion of the president’s decisions. Former U.S. amba…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Iran will no longer abide by 2015 nuclear deal following Soleimani's death
articles.description: Iranian's state television reported that it is ending the commitment to the 2015 nuclear deal with world powers following the U.S. strike that killed Gen. Qassem Soleimani.
